fr:frontmatter.fr:title: Sur la topologie des variétés algébriques en caractéristique p
fr:frontmatter.fr:meta: Symposium internacional de topologia algebraica, Mexico, 1956, Universidad nacional autonoma, Mexico, pp. 24–53

@inproceedings{Ser1958b, title = {Sur la topologie des vari\'{e}t\'{e}s alg\'{e}briques en caract\'{e}ristique $p$}, booktitle = {Symposium internacional de topologia algebraica, {{Mexico}}, 1956}, author = {Serre, J.-P.}, year = {1958}, publisher = {{Universidad nacional autonoma, Mexico}}, pages = {24--53}, }

fr:mainmatter.fr:p:
In the case of a simple projective morphism f \colon X \to S, with S reduced and of residual characteristics zero, the result of was already known, by transcendental methods, as a consequence of Hodge theory. In fact, all the \operatorname {R} ^pf_*( \Omega _{X/S}^q) are then locally free.
We have, however, counterexamples in the case of unequal characteristics for "locally free \operatorname {R} ^1f_*( \mathcal {O} _X)", by Serre varieties ([Ser1958b, p.50]). It seems that we do not have any counterexample in equal characteristic.
